nodes.description: 2003年美国入侵后引发的教派流血冲突正在逐渐消退。
nodes.support_text: as the sectarian bloodshed set off after the 2003 U.S.-led invasion fades.

nodes.description: 2006年至2007年间，伊拉克经历了全面的教派战争。
nodes.support_text: since the all-out sectarian warfare of 2006-07

nodes.description: 3月7日举行的伊拉克选举未能产生明确的获胜者。
nodes.support_text: the March 7 election which produced no outright winner.

nodes.description: 一周前，巴格达中央银行遭到袭击，造成18人死亡。
nodes.support_text: A week earlier, gunmen and suicide bombers laid siege to the central bank in Baghdad, killing 18 people

nodes.description: 周日，两名自杀式炸弹袭击者在伊拉克贸易银行外引爆汽车炸弹。
nodes.support_text: Two suicide bombers detonated cars laden with explosives outside the Trade Bank of Iraq on Sunday

nodes.description: 这次袭击造成26人死亡，53人受伤。
nodes.support_text: killing 26 people... Fifty-three people were wounded in the blasts

nodes.description: 安全官员将一周前的中央银行袭击归咎于与基地组织有关的逊尼派叛乱分子。
nodes.support_text: Security officials blamed the June 13 central bank attack on Sunni Islamist insurgents linked to al Qaeda

nodes.description: 安全官员怀疑基地组织是周日起袭的幕后黑手。
nodes.support_text: Moussawi told local television al Qaeda was suspected.

nodes.description: 前总理阿拉维警告，若其被边缘化，逊尼派选民的不满可能引发更多暴力。
nodes.support_text: The leader of the cross-sectarian Iraqiya list, former Prime Minister Iyad Allawi, has warned that frustration among Sunni voters could lead to increased violence if he is sidelined.

nodes.description: 这起最新的袭击事件引发了对国家稳定性的担忧。
nodes.support_text: The latest attack has raised concerns about the nation's stability.

nodes.description: 银行努力鼓励外国投资。
nodes.support_text: 银行努力鼓励外国投资。

nodes.description: 一个政治真空紧随3月7日的选举之后出现。
nodes.support_text: a political vacuum that followed the March 7 election

nodes.description: 围攻事件加剧了人们对叛乱分子试图利用政治真空的恐惧。
nodes.support_text: fueling fears that insurgents are trying to exploit a political vacuum

nodes.description: 叛乱分子正试图利用一个政治真空。
nodes.support_text: insurgents are trying to exploit a political vacuum

nodes.description: 叛乱分子利用一个政治真空。
nodes.support_text: insurgents are trying to exploit a political vacuum

nodes.description: 巴格达安全发言人卡西姆·穆萨维少将发表了一份关于汽车炸弹袭击的声明。
nodes.support_text: 巴格达安全发言人卡西姆·穆萨维少将发表了一份关于汽车炸弹袭击的声明。

nodes.description: 他将初始死亡人数设定为18。
nodes.support_text: 他将初始死亡人数设定为18。

nodes.description: 爆炸在银行前的主干道上留下了两个烧焦弹坑。
nodes.support_text: 爆炸在银行前的主干道上留下了两个相隔几米的烧焦弹坑。

nodes.description: 大楼被爆炸严重损坏。
nodes.support_text: 大楼被爆炸严重损坏。

nodes.description: 警察们正在守卫一个附近的内政部办公室。
nodes.support_text: 警察们正在守卫一个附近的内政部办公室。

nodes.description: 该内政部办公室签发伊拉克身份证。
nodes.support_text: 该内政部办公室签发伊拉克身份证。

nodes.description: 一系列事件正在我的国家发生。
nodes.support_text: 马哈茂德·阿西说，他为国家正在发生的事情感到非常抱歉。

nodes.description: 血迹弄脏了他的衣服。
nodes.support_text: 血迹弄脏了他白色的长袍。

nodes.description: 马哈茂德·阿西说，他为国家正在发生的事情感到非常抱歉。
nodes.support_text: 马哈茂德·阿西说，他为国家正在发生的事情感到非常抱歉。

nodes.description: 他说，所有银行的警卫都被杀害了。
nodes.support_text: 他说，所有银行的警卫都被杀害了。

nodes.description: 安全官员表示，叛乱分子试图证明他们在遭受重大打击后仍然具有实力。
nodes.support_text: Security officials said the insurgents were trying to prove they remained potent after suffering significant blows...

nodes.description: 叛乱分子试图证明他们仍然具有实力。
nodes.support_text: they were trying to prove they remained potent

nodes.description: 叛乱分子在今年遭受了重大打击。
nodes.support_text: suffering significant blows this year

nodes.description: （有人）杀害了叛乱分子的伊拉克领导人。
nodes.support_text: their Iraq leaders were killed

nodes.description: 安全官员表示，那次袭击也是企图在选举后重新点燃什叶派和逊尼派之间的暴力。
nodes.support_text: Security officials also said that attack was also an attempt to reignite violence...

nodes.description: 那次袭击是一次企图重新点燃什叶派和逊尼派之间暴力的尝试。
nodes.support_text: that attack was also an attempt to reignite violence between majority Shi’ites and once dominant Sunnis

nodes.description: 叛乱分子试图在什叶派和逊尼派之间重新点燃暴力。
nodes.support_text: reignite violence between majority Shi’ites and once dominant Sunnis

edges.support_text: Overall violence has dropped sharply since the all-out sectarian warfare of 2006-07
fueling fears that insurgents are trying to exploit a political vacuum that followed the March 7 election
The leader of the cross-sectarian Iraqiya list, former Prime Minister Iyad Allawi, has warned that frustration among Sunni voters could lead to increased violence if he is sidelined.
a political vacuum that followed the March 7 election
A week earlier, gunmen and suicide bombers laid siege to the central bank in Baghdad
Security officials blamed the June 13 central bank attack on Sunni Islamist insurgents linked to al Qaeda
the siege event... fueling fears...
报告或设定死亡人数的行为发生在造成死亡的事件之后。
Two suicide bombers detonated cars laden with explosives outside the Trade Bank of Iraq on Sunday, killing 26 people
There was no immediate claim of responsibility for Sunday’s assault on the Trade Bank of Iraq... Moussawi told local television al Qaeda was suspected.
The latest attack has raised concerns about the nation's stability.
根据动词事件列表中的 temporal_order (1 < 4)，drive 事件发生在 say 事件之前。
爆炸是留下弹坑的原因。
爆炸是损坏大楼的原因。
根据语义，'that attack' (node_5) 是 'attempt' (new_node_22) 的主体，因此发生在其之前。
根据动词事件列表中的 temporal_order (2 < 4)，encourage 事件发生在 blow in 事件之前。
fueling fears that insurgents are trying to exploit a political vacuum that followed the March 7 election
fueling fears that insurgents are trying to exploit a political vacuum
insurgents are trying to exploit a political vacuum (try precedes exploit)
根据动词事件列表中的 temporal_order (2 < 3)，leave 事件发生在 damage 事件之前。
根据动词事件列表中的 temporal_order (1 < 2)，'issue' 事件发生在 'guard' 事件之前。
根据 temporal_order (1 < 2)，happen 事件发生在 say (apology) 事件之前。
根据 temporal_order (1 < 2)，stain 事件发生在 say (apology) 事件之前。
根据 temporal_order (2 < 3)，say (apology) 事件发生在 say (guards killed) 事件之前。
根据 temporal_order (4 < 5)，prove 事件发生在 say 事件之前。
根据 temporal_order (2 < 4)，suffer 事件发生在 prove 事件之前。
根据 temporal_order (1 < 2)，kill 事件发生在 suffer 事件之前。
根据语义，'attempt' (new_node_22) 的内容是 'reignite violence' (new_node_23)。
根据 temporal_order (4 < 5)，attempt 事件发生在 say 事件之前。
